p.k: Royal Flush When the other kids fear Harold has accidentally flushed himself down Chef's fancy new toilet, they travel into the sewer on a rescue mission. But will they find Harold before the mythical Alligator King traps them underground forever?
p.d: Our favourite cast members are back as you've never seen them before... four-year-olds in a daycare center! While their bodies may be pint-sized, their fully-formed teen personalities make them wise beyond their years and if there's trouble to get into, they will find it!
